parameters.name: instance
parameters.description: Azure DevOps server name ({server:port})

parameters.name: collection
parameters.description: The name of the Azure DevOps collection.

parameters.name: project
parameters.description: Project ID or project name

parameters.name: assignedToFilter
parameters.description: Approvals assigned to this user.

parameters.name: statusFilter
parameters.description: Approvals with this status. Default is 'pending'.

parameters.name: releaseIdsFilter
parameters.description: Approvals for release id(s) mentioned in the filter. Multiple releases can be mentioned by separating them with ',' e.g. releaseIdsFilter=1,2,3,4.

parameters.name: typeFilter
parameters.description: Approval with this type.

parameters.name: top
parameters.description: Number of approvals to get. Default is 50.

parameters.name: continuationToken
parameters.description: Gets the approvals after the continuation token provided.

parameters.name: queryOrder
parameters.description: Gets the results in the defined order of created approvals. Default is 'descending'.

parameters.name: includeMyGroupApprovals
parameters.description: 'true' to include my group approvals. Default is 'false'.

parameters.name: collection
parameters.description: The name of the Azure DevOps collection.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: ReleaseApproval object having status, approver and comments.

parameters.name: project
parameters.description: Project ID or project name

parameters.name: approvalId
parameters.description: Id of the approval.

parameters.description: The name of the Azure DevOps collection.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: release definition object to create.

get.description: Get a list of release definitions.

parameters.name: collection
parameters.description: The name of the Azure DevOps collection.

parameters.name: project
parameters.description: Project ID or project name

parameters.name: searchText
parameters.description: Get release definitions with names containing searchText.

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: The properties that should be expanded in the list of Release definitions.

parameters.name: artifactType
parameters.description: Release definitions with given artifactType will be returned. Values can be Build, Jenkins, GitHub, Nuget, Team Build (external), ExternalTFSBuild, Git, TFVC, ExternalTfsXamlBuild.

parameters.name: artifactSourceId
parameters.description: Release definitions with given artifactSourceId will be returned. e.g. For build it would be {projectGuid}:{BuildDefinitionId}, for Jenkins it would be {JenkinsConnectionId}:{JenkinsDefinitionId}, for TfsOnPrem it would be {TfsOnPremConnectionId}:{ProjectName}:{TfsOnPremDefinitionId}. For third-party artifacts e.g. TeamCity, BitBucket you may refer 'uniqueSourceIdentifier' inside vss-extension-onprem.json at https://github.com/Microsoft/vsts-rm-extensions/blob/master/Extensions.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Number of release definitions to get.

parameters.name: continuationToken
parameters.description: Gets the release definitions after the continuation token provided.

parameters.name: queryOrder
parameters.description: Gets the results in the defined order. Default is 'IdAscending'.

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: Gets the release definitions under the specified path.

parameters.name: isExactNameMatch
parameters.description: 'true'to gets the release definitions with exact match as specified in searchText. Default is 'false'.

parameters.name: tagFilter
parameters.description: A comma-delimited list of tags. Only release definitions with these tags will be returned.

parameters.name: propertyFilters
parameters.description: A comma-delimited list of extended properties to be retrieved. If set, the returned Release Definitions will contain values for the specified property Ids (if they exist). If not set, properties will not be included. Note that this will not filter out any Release Definition from results irrespective of whether it has property set or not.

parameters.name: definitionIdFilter
parameters.description: A comma-delimited list of release definitions to retrieve.

parameters.name: isDeleted
parameters.description: 'true' to get release definitions that has been deleted. Default is 'false'

parameters.name: collection
parameters.description: The name of the Azure DevOps collection.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Release definition object to update.

parameters.name: project
parameters.description: Project ID or project name

parameters.name: collection
parameters.description: The name of the Azure DevOps collection.

parameters.name: project
parameters.description: Project ID or project name

parameters.name: definitionId
parameters.description: Id of the release definition.

parameters.name: comment
parameters.description: Comment for deleting a release definition.

parameters.name: forceDelete
parameters.description: 'true' to automatically cancel any in-progress release deployments and proceed with release definition deletion . Default is 'false'.

parameters.description: The name of the Azure DevOps collection.

parameters.description: A comma-delimited list of extended properties to be retrieved. If set, the returned Release Definition will contain values for the specified property Ids (if they exist). If not set, properties will not be included.

parameters.description: Metadata to patch the Release Gates.

parameters.name: project
parameters.description: Project ID or project name

parameters.name: gateStepId
parameters.description: Gate step Id.

parameters.name: collection
parameters.description: The name of the Azure DevOps collection.

parameters.name: project
parameters.description: Project ID or project name

parameters.name: definitionId
parameters.description: Releases from this release definition Id.

parameters.name: searchText
parameters.description: Releases with names containing searchText.

parameters.name: createdBy
parameters.description: Releases created by this user.

parameters.name: statusFilter
parameters.description: Releases that have this status.

parameters.name: minCreatedTime
parameters.description: Releases that were created after this time.

parameters.name: maxCreatedTime
parameters.description: Releases that were created before this time.

parameters.name: queryOrder
parameters.description: Gets the results in the defined order of created date for releases. Default is descending.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Number of releases to get. Default is 50.

parameters.name: continuationToken
parameters.description: Gets the releases after the continuation token provided.

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: The property that should be expanded in the list of releases.

parameters.name: artifactTypeId
parameters.description: Releases with given artifactTypeId will be returned. Values can be Build, Jenkins, GitHub, Nuget, Team Build (external), ExternalTFSBuild, Git, TFVC, ExternalTfsXamlBuild.

parameters.name: sourceId
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the artifact used. e.g. For build it would be {projectGuid}:{BuildDefinitionId}, for Jenkins it would be {JenkinsConnectionId}:{JenkinsDefinitionId}, for TfsOnPrem it would be {TfsOnPremConnectionId}:{ProjectName}:{TfsOnPremDefinitionId}. For third-party artifacts e.g. TeamCity, BitBucket you may refer 'uniqueSourceIdentifier' inside vss-extension.json https://github.com/Microsoft/vsts-rm-extensions/blob/master/Extensions.

parameters.name: artifactVersionId
parameters.description: Releases with given artifactVersionId will be returned. E.g. in case of Build artifactType, it is buildId.

parameters.name: sourceBranchFilter
parameters.description: Releases with given sourceBranchFilter will be returned.

parameters.name: isDeleted
parameters.description: Gets the soft deleted releases, if true.

parameters.name: tagFilter
parameters.description: A comma-delimited list of tags. Only releases with these tags will be returned.

parameters.name: propertyFilters
parameters.description: A comma-delimited list of extended properties to be retrieved. If set, the returned Releases will contain values for the specified property Ids (if they exist). If not set, properties will not be included. Note that this will not filter out any Release from results irrespective of whether it has property set or not.

parameters.name: releaseIdFilter
parameters.description: A comma-delimited list of releases Ids. Only releases with these Ids will be returned.

parameters.name: approvalFilters
parameters.description: A filter which would allow fetching approval steps selectively based on whether it is automated, or manual. This would also decide whether we should fetch pre and post approval snapshots. Assumes All by default

values.description: No approvals or approval snapshots
Manual approval steps but no approval snapshots (Use with ApprovalSnapshots for snapshots)
Automated approval steps but no approval snapshots (Use with ApprovalSnapshots for snapshots)
No approval steps, but approval snapshots (Use with either ManualApprovals or AutomatedApprovals for approval steps)
All approval steps and approval snapshots

parameters.name: propertyFilters
parameters.description: A comma-delimited list of extended properties to be retrieved. If set, the returned Release will contain values for the specified property Ids (if they exist). If not set, properties will not be included.

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: A property that should be expanded in the release.

parameters.name: $topGateRecords
parameters.description: Number of release gate records to get. Default is 5.

AgentPoolQueueReference.description: Represents a reference to an agent queue.

definitionReference.description: Gets or sets definition reference. e.g. {"project":{"id":"fed755ea-49c5-4399-acea-fd5b5aa90a6c","name":"myProject"},"definition":{"id":"1","name":"mybuildDefinition"},"connection":{"id":"1","name":"myConnection"}}

isPrimary.description: Gets or sets as artifact is primary or not.

type.description: Gets or sets type. It can have value as 'Build', 'Jenkins', 'GitHub', 'Nuget', 'Team Build (external)', 'ExternalTFSBuild', 'Git', 'TFVC', 'ExternalTfsXamlBuild'.

instanceReference.description: Sets instance reference of artifact. e.g. for build artifact it is build number.

artifactAlias.description: Artifact source alias for Artifact Source trigger type

jobCancelTimeoutInMinutes.description: Gets or sets the job cancel timeout in minutes for deployment which are cancelled by user for this release environment

timeoutInMinutes.description: Gets or sets the job execution timeout in minutes for deployment which are queued against this release environment

Change.description: Represents a change associated with a build.

displayUri.description: The location of a user-friendly representation of the resource.

id.description: Something that identifies the change. For a commit, this would be the SHA1. For a TFVC changeset, this would be the changeset id.

location.description: The location of the full representation of the resource.

message.description: A description of the change. This might be a commit message or changeset description.

pushedBy.description: The person or process that pushed the change.

conditionType.description: Gets or sets the condition type.

values.description: The condition type is undefined.
The condition type is event.
The condition type is environment state.
The condition type is artifact.

name.description: Gets or sets the name of the condition. e.g. 'ReleaseStarted'.

value.description: Gets or set value of the condition.

allowOverride.description: Gets or sets if a variable can be overridden at deployment time or not.

isSecret.description: Gets or sets as variable is secret or not.

value.description: Gets or sets value of the configuration variable.

DataSourceBindingBase.description: Represents binding of data source for the service endpoint request.

callbackContextTemplate.description: Pagination format supported by this data source(ContinuationToken/SkipTop).

dataSourceName.description: Gets or sets the name of the data source.

endpointId.description: Gets or sets the endpoint Id.

endpointUrl.description: Gets or sets the url of the service endpoint.

headers.description: Gets or sets the authorization headers.

initialContextTemplate.description: Defines the initial value of the query params

parameters.description: Gets or sets the parameters for the data source.

resultSelector.description: Gets or sets the result selector.

resultTemplate.description: Gets or sets the result template.

target.description: Gets or sets the target of the data source.

completedOn.description: Gets the date on which deployment is complete.

conditions.description: Gets the list of condition associated with deployment.

issues.description: All the issues related to the deployment

EnvironmentExecutionPolicy.description: Defines policy on environment queuing at Release Management side queue. We will send to Environment Runner [creating pre-deploy and other steps] only when the policies mentioned are satisfied.

concurrencyCount.description: This policy decides, how many environments would be with Environment Runner.

queueDepthCount.description: Queue depth in the EnvironmentQueue table, this table keeps the environment entries till Environment Runner is free [as per it's policy] to take another environment for running.

data.description: Application specific data for the entry

id.description: Unique Id of the the entry

type.description: Application specific favorite entry type. Empty or Null represents that Favorite item is a Folder

gatesToIgnore.description: Name of gate to be ignored.

_links.description: This field contains zero or more interesting links about the graph subject. These links may be invoked to obtain additional relationships or more detailed information about this graph subject.

descriptor.description: The descriptor is the primary way to reference the graph subject while the system is running. This field will uniquely identify the same graph subject across both Accounts and collections.

displayName.description: This is the non-unique display name of the graph subject. To change this field, you must alter its value in the source provider.

url.description: This url is the full route to the source resource of this graph subject.

lastModifiedOn.description: Gets the date on which gate is last ignored.

dependencyInputIds.description: The ids of all inputs that the value of this input is dependent on.

description.description: Description of what this input is used for

groupName.description: The group localized name to which this input belongs and can be shown as a header for the container that will include all the inputs in the group.

hasDynamicValueInformation.description: If true, the value information for this input is dynamic and should be fetched when the value of dependency inputs change.

inputMode.description: Mode in which the value of this input should be entered

values.description: This input should not be shown in the UI
An input text box should be shown
An password input box should be shown
A select/combo control should be shown
Radio buttons should be shown
Checkbox should be shown(for true/false values)
A multi-line text area should be shown

isConfidential.description: Gets whether this input is confidential, such as for a password or application key

name.description: Localized name which can be shown as a label for the subscription input

properties.description: Custom properties for the input which can be used by the service provider

type.description: Underlying data type for the input value. When this value is specified, InputMode, Validation and Values are optional.

useInDefaultDescription.description: Gets whether this input is included in the default generated action description.

validation.description: Information to use to validate this input's value

valueHint.description: A hint for input value. It can be used in the UI as the input placeholder.

values.description: Information about possible values for this input

InputValidation.description: Describes what values are valid for a subscription input

values.description: No data type is specified.
Represents a textual value.
Represents a numberic value.
Represents a value of true or false.
Represents a Guid.
Represents a URI.

InputValue.description: Information about a single value for an input

data.description: Any other data about this input

displayValue.description: The text to show for the display of this value

value.description: The value to store for this input

InputValues.description: Information about the possible/allowed values for a given subscription input

defaultValue.description: The default value to use for this input

error.description: Errors encountered while computing dynamic values.

isLimitedToPossibleValues.description: Should the value be restricted to one of the values in the PossibleValues (True) or are the values in PossibleValues just a suggestion (False)

isReadOnly.description: Should this input be made read-only

possibleValues.description: Possible values that this input can take

InputValuesError.description: Error information related to a subscription input value.

inputValues.description: The input values to return on input, and the result from the consumer on output.

resource.description: Subscription containing information about the publisher/consumer and the current input values

approver.description: Gets or sets the identity who should approve.

comments.description: Gets or sets comments for approval.

createdOn.description: Gets date on which it got created.

id.description: Gets the unique identifier for manual intervention.

instructions.description: Gets or sets instructions for approval.

modifiedOn.description: Gets date on which it got modified.

status.description: Gets or sets the status of the manual intervention.

values.description: The manual intervention does not have the status set.
The manual intervention is pending.
The manual intervention is rejected.
The manual intervention is approved.
The manual intervention is canceled.

url.description: Gets url to access the manual intervention.

comment.description: Sets the comment for manual intervention update.

status.description: Sets the status of the manual intervention.

values.description: The manual intervention does not have the status set.
The manual intervention is pending.
The manual intervention is rejected.
The manual intervention is approved.
The manual intervention is canceled.

id.description: Gets the unique identifier of this field.

PropertiesCollection.description: The class represents a property bag as a collection of key-value pairs. Values of all primitive types (any type with a `TypeCode != TypeCode.Object`) except for `DBNull` are accepted. Values of type Byte[], Int32, Double, DateType and String preserve their type, other primitives are retuned as a String. Byte[] expected as base64 encoded string.

count.description: The count of properties in the collection.

keys.description: The set of keys in the collection.

values.description: The set of values in the collection.

useArtifactReference.description: In case of Source based artifacts, Code reference will be present in Artifact details.

ReferenceLinks.description: The class to represent a collection of REST reference links.

links.description: The readonly view of the links.  Because Reference links are readonly, we only want to expose them as read only.

_links.description: Gets links to access the release.

artifacts.description: Gets or sets the list of artifacts.

createdOn.description: Gets date on which it got created.

definitionSnapshotRevision.description: Gets revision number of definition snapshot.

description.description: Gets or sets description of release.

id.description: Gets the unique identifier of this field.

keepForever.description: Whether to exclude the release from retention policies.

variables.description: Gets or sets the dictionary of variables.

attempt.description: Gets or sets attempt which specifies as which deployment attempt it belongs.

comments.description: Gets or sets comments for approval.

createdOn.description: Gets date on which it got created.

history.description: Gets history which specifies all approvals associated with this approval.

id.description: Gets the unique identifier of this field.

isAutomated.description: Gets or sets as approval is automated or not.

modifiedOn.description: Gets date on which it got modified.

rank.description: Gets or sets rank which specifies the order of the approval. e.g. Same rank denotes parallel approval.

release.description: Gets releaseReference which specifies the reference of the release to which this approval is associated.

releaseDefinition.description: Gets releaseDefinitionReference which specifies the reference of the release definition to which this approval is associated.

releaseEnvironment.description: Gets releaseEnvironmentReference which specifies the reference of the release environment to which this approval is associated.

status.description: Gets or sets the status of the approval.

url.description: Gets url to access the approval.

artifacts.description: Gets or sets the list of artifacts.

createdBy.description: Gets or sets the identity who created.

createdOn.description: Gets date on which it got created.

environments.description: Gets or sets the list of environments.

lastRelease.description: Gets the reference of last release.

modifiedBy.description: Gets or sets the identity who modified.

modifiedOn.description: Gets date on which it got modified.

releaseNameFormat.description: Gets or sets the release name format.

source.description: Gets or sets source of release definition.

tags.description: Gets or sets list of tags.

triggers.description: Gets or sets the list of triggers.

variableGroups.description: Gets or sets the list of variable groups.

variables.description: Gets or sets the dictionary of variables.

tasks.description: The list of steps for this definition.

changedBy.description: Gets the identity who did change.

api-Version.name: api-version
api-Version.description: Version of the API to use.  This should be set to '5.0' to use this version of the api.

api-Version-preview.1.name: api-version
api-Version-preview.1.description: Version of the API to use.  This should be set to '5.0-preview.1' to use this version of the api.

api-Version-preview.2.description: Version of the API to use.  This should be set to '5.0-preview.2' to use this version of the api.

accessToken.description: Personal access token. Use any value for the user name and the token as the password.

scopes.vso.release: Grants the ability to read release artifacts, including releases, release definitions and release environment.
scopes.vso.release_execute: Grants the ability to read and update release artifacts, including releases, release definitions and release envrionment, and the ability to queue a new release.
scopes.vso.release_manage: Grants the ability to read, update and delete release artifacts, including releases, release definitions and release envrionment, and the ability to queue and approve a new release.
